sql:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM title t, cast_info ci, movie_info mi
WHERE t.id = ci.movie_id AND t.id = mi.movie_id AND t.kind_id  <  6 AND t.production_year  <  1970 AND ci.role_id  >  2 AND mi.info_type_id  >  3
